meanings.definition: The state or quality of being complex or intricate.
meanings.sent1: The complicacies of the puzzle left me puzzled for hours.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to understand the complicacies of the scientific theory.
meanings.sent3: The complicacies of planning a surprise party can be quite challenging.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the complicacies of relationships requires patience and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The complicacies of the legal system can be overwhelming for many people.

meanings.definition: Complicated or intricate details or features.
meanings.sent1: The artist added complicacies to the painting to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was adorned with beautiful complicacies that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The complicacies of the design made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with complicacies that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The complicacies of the architecture showcased the talent of the designer.
